title: Embroidered Picture, ca. 1790
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, daisy, speckling and running stitches on plain weave
description: Oval picture within a rectangular frame of a mill on a mill pond with a town in the background and fishermen in front, in black on cream foundation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, daisy, speckling and running stitches on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-9.
